definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Although the gendarmerie is ahead of the market the market is catching up.
sentences.chinese: 雖然憲兵，是市場上的領先地位，市場正在迎頭趕上。

sentences.english: Japan has a lead in the industrial use of robots.
sentences.chinese: 日本在工業上使用機械人方面處於領先地位。

sentences.english: Will Dell be able to regain back its leadership position in MSS?
sentences.chinese: 戴爾將能重拾回了其領先地位，在重建置業？

sentences.english: The Chinese Diving Team has maintained their leading position in the medal rankings.
sentences.chinese: 中國跳水隊保持了在獎牌榜上的領先地位。

sentences.english: That team blew the lead by making a bad play.
sentences.chinese: 那個隊打得很差而失去了領先地位。

sentences.english: He had to work hard to remain ahead of his classmates.
sentences.chinese: 他必須努力學習以保持他在同學中的領先地位。

sentences.english: The Chinese diving team maintained their leading position in the medal rankings.
sentences.chinese: 中國跳水隊保持了在獎牌榜上的領先地位。

sentences.english: In campaigns to reduce measles mortality, Africa has led the way.
sentences.chinese: 在降低麻疹死亡率運動中，非洲處於領先地位。

sentences.english: We are marked leader in neurosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 我們在神經外科領域處於顯著領先地位。

sentences.english: EUROSTRIP ○R direct strip production technology is steadily consolidating its advanced position in strip casting.
sentences.chinese: 技術在帶鋼連鑄生產領域穩居領先地位。

sentences.english: A few years ago, Spain becames the world leader in frits and glazes sector.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前，西班牙色釉料行業在世界取得了領先地位。

sentences.english: The Stamford team is in first place.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦福德隊處於領先地位。

sentences.english: Heckman is also a leader of applied research in these areas.
sentences.chinese: 他在這些領域進行的應用研究也具有領先地位。

sentences.english: Clariant is a global leader in the field of specialty chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 科萊恩是全球處於領先地位的特種化工產品公司。

sentences.english: They were in the lead . The finish line was close.
sentences.chinese: 他們目前居於領先地位，終點線就在前面不遠了。

sentences.english: The Eastman Kodak Company was an iconic industry leader.
sentences.chinese: 柯達公司在行業內一直處於標誌性領先地位。
